tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sender VARCHAR(50),
  recipient VARCHAR(50),
  message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    content TEXT,
    agency_id INT,
    government_id INT,
    community_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
  sender_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  receiver_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender VARCHAR(255),
    receiver VARCHAR(255),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE relief_agencies (
    agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE government_entities (
    entity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    entity_name VARCHAR(255),
    entity_type VARCHAR(100),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE affected_communities (
    community_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    community_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    population INT,
    needs TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_id INT,
    entity_id INT,
    community_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES relief_agencies(agency_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (entity_id) REFERENCES government_entities(entity_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (community_id) REFERENCES affected_communities(community_id)
);
